channel.title: Help with Char file
channel.description:
yo.. my friend on MSN wants me to help him code something.. i dont have the time to show him or help him or look up any of the info i need to help him with..
so can someone show me or tell me what to tell him.. he wants to know how to make a donator icon for in game
I was thinking,
Add another line in the char file where it'll save his CharacterDonater = 0 or Character Donater = 1..
when it's at 1 he wants an icon to appear next to the name like the crowns do in game..
1. is this possible? 2. What do i tell my friend on how to do it? 3. Help pl0x :D

item.title: Help with Char file
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

It’s because this guy doesn’t know how to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Char file
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:8, topic:315693”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=412157.msg3038595#msg3038595 date=1258921959]

ya… thats also wut i told my friend… but i really dont think he’s understandon too much of this…

someone shud REALLY help him…

why don’t you, since you told him that you would help?

I’m not going to sit here and spoonfeed him the whole thing.

i didn’t quote you.
[/quote]

As far as you know, I didn’t quote you either. :|[/quote]
ballshit.

Read full topic
